</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registerbankinfo/valuemapping">ValueMapping</a></>}>
Helper struct that represents how a value is mapped through different register banks. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registerbankinfo/valuemapping/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo/instructionmapping">InstructionMapping</a></>}>
Helper class that represents how the value of an instruction may be mapped and what is the related cost of such mapping. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo/instructionmapping/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo/operandsmapper">OperandsMapper</a></>}>

<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Helper struct that represents how a value is mapped through</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// different register banks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\note: So far we do not have any users of the complex mappings</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (mappings with more than one partial mapping), but when we do,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// we would have needed to duplicate partial mappings.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The alternative could be to use an array of pointers of partial</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// mapping (i.e., PartialMapping &#42;&#42;BreakDown) and duplicate the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// pointers instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// E.g.,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Let say we have a 32-bit add and a &lt;2 x 32-bit&gt; vadd. We</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// can expand the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &lt;2 x 32-bit&gt; add into 2 x 32-bit add.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Currently the TableGen-like file would look like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// PartialMapping&#91;&#93; = &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// /&#42;32-bit add&#42;/      &#123;0, 32, GPR&#125;, // Scalar entry repeated for first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                                   // vec elt.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// /&#42;2x32-bit add&#42;/    &#123;0, 32, GPR&#125;, &#123;32, 32, GPR&#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// /&#42;&lt;2x32-bit&gt; vadd&#42;/ &#123;0, 64, VPR&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#125;; // PartialMapping duplicated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   /&#42;plain &lt;2x32-bit&gt; vadd&#42;/  &#123;&amp;PartialMapping&#91;3&#93;, 1&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// With the array of pointer, we would have:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   /&#42;plain &lt;2x32-bit&gt; vadd&#42;/  &#123;&amp;BreakDowns&#91;3&#93;, 1&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Constructor for the mapping of an instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// \\p NumOperands must be equal to number of all the operands of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// the related instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The rationale is that it is more efficient for the optimizers</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">        : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>), OperandsMapping(OperandsMapping),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">          NumOperands(NumOperands) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The type of the new registers is a plain scalar of the right size.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Try to get the mapping of \\p MI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// See getInstrMapping for more details on what a mapping represents.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Unlike getInstrMapping the returned InstructionMapping may be invalid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (isValid() == false).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This means that the target independent code is not smart enough</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to get the mapping of \\p MI and thus, the target has to provide the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// information for \\p MI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This implementation is able to get the mapping of:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - Target specific instructions by looking at the encoding constraints.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - Any instruction if all the register operands have already been assigned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   a register, a register class, or a register bank.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - Copies and phis if at least one of the operands has been assigned a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   register, a register class, or a register bank.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// In other words, this method will likely fail to find a mapping for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// any generic opcode that has not been lowered by target specific code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InstructionMapping &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo/#af5535a05921d5db8486cc4ce527b066f">getInstrMappingImpl</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Get the cost of a copy from \\p B to \\p A, or put differently,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// get the cost of A = COPY B. Since register banks may cover</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// different size, \\p Size specifies what will be the size in bits</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// that will be copied around.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\note Since this is a copy, both registers have the same size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo/#ace62a3b4e043e1740264ffd8a6b6cfb5"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo/#ace62a3b4e043e1740264ffd8a6b6cfb5">copyCost</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbank">RegisterBank</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbank">RegisterBank</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Optimistically assume that copies are coalesced. I.e., when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// they are on the same bank, they are free.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise assume a non-zero cost of 1 The targets are supposed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to override that properly anyway if they care.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Get the mapping of the different operands of \\p MI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// on the register bank.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This mapping should be the direct translation of \\p MI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// In other words, when \\p MI is mapped with the returned mapping,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// only the register banks of the operands of \\p MI need to be updated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// In particular, neither the opcode nor the type of \\p MI needs to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// updated for this direct mapping.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The target independent implementation gives a mapping based on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the register classes for the target specific opcode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// It uses the ID RegisterBankInfo::DefaultMappingID for that mapping.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Make sure you do not use that ID for the alternative mapping</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// for MI. See getInstrAlternativeMappings for the alternative</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// mappings.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// For instance, if \\p MI is a vector add, the mapping should</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// not be a scalarization of the add.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\post returnedVal.verify(MI).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\note If returnedVal does not verify MI, this would probably mean</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// that the target does not support that instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo/instructionmapping">InstructionMapping</a> &amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo/#a3f495e9cf115e5d32f21d729c46a484e">getInstrMapping</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Get the alternative mappings for \\p MI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Alternative in the sense different from getInstrMapping.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo/#ac89dbbb6460391f27fb352c20c600769">InstructionMappings</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo/#a104c33de0485a9518a9cae99b7023c84">getInstrAlternativeMappings</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Get the possible mapping for \\p MI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A mapping defines where the different operands may live and at what cost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// For instance, let us consider:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// v0(16) = G&#95;ADD &lt;2 x i8&gt; v1, v2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The possible mapping could be:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#123;/&#42;ID&#42;/VectorAdd, /&#42;Cost&#42;/1, /&#42;v0&#42;/&#123;(0xFFFF, VPR)&#125;, /&#42;v1&#42;/&#123;(0xFFFF, VPR)&#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                              /&#42;v2&#42;/&#123;(0xFFFF, VPR)&#125;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#123;/&#42;ID&#42;/ScalarAddx2, /&#42;Cost&#42;/2, /&#42;v0&#42;/&#123;(0x00FF, GPR),(0xFF00, GPR)&#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                                /&#42;v1&#42;/&#123;(0x00FF, GPR),(0xFF00, GPR)&#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                                /&#42;v2&#42;/&#123;(0x00FF, GPR),(0xFF00, GPR)&#125;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\note The first alternative of the returned mapping should be the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// direct translation of \\p MI current form.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\post !returnedVal.empty().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo/#ac89dbbb6460391f27fb352c20c600769">InstructionMappings</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo/#a9ad9f326100ec08e3cde9f430fcb36f1">getInstrPossibleMappings</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Apply \\p OpdMapper.getInstrMapping() to \\p OpdMapper.getMI().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// After this call \\p OpdMapper.getMI() may not be valid anymore.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p OpdMapper.getInstrMapping().getID() carries the information of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// what has been chosen to map \\p OpdMapper.getMI(). This ID is set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// by the various getInstrXXXMapping method.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Therefore, getting the mapping and applying it should be kept in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// sync.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo/#a0c85003f2e4060a7b61ebff7c2fb33cd"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo/#a0c85003f2e4060a7b61ebff7c2fb33cd">applyMapping</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp;Builder,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo/operandsmapper">OperandsMapper</a> &amp;OpdMapper)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The only mapping we know how to handle is the default mapping.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OpdMapper.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo/operandsmapper/#a08b29851bd7d2ce50c53e87b9043532a">getInstrMapping</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo/instructionmapping/#a4c3dac40d5cd4191d6c8c8686c93cfb5">getID</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo/#abe7d332de484fcc6cdc4c2a5e7bdd31b">DefaultMappingID</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo/#a5c8b942e0a2e8ebef5a138c8d3c4462c">applyDefaultMapping</a>(OpdMapper);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For other mapping, the target needs to do the right thing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If that means calling applyDefaultMapping, fine, but this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// must be explicitly stated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo/#a456001a06a780d59754de42e0fdb8d84">applyMappingImpl</a>(Builder, OpdMapper);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
